ComicInfo.Summary:
After hunting in the jungle Meriem is captured by the landing crew of the starship USS Blish, who is hot on the trail of their most dangerous adversary - Ankha! Will Meriem join Commander Rega and his time traveling crew to stop Ankha once and for all? Please join us for this far out story and find out - will this be Meriem's Revenge?
